# Repository Configuration

## GitHub Repository About Section

### Description
**Production-ready solution for handling oversized JSON with Microsoft Foundry. 5-step LLM processing pipeline + TOON token optimization for 25-35% cost reduction.**

### Website
Link to documentation: `https://github.com/msftsean/handling-oversized-json/blob/main/docs/INDEX.md`

### Topics (Tags)
- `llm`
- `azure-openai`
- `json-processing`
- `toon-optimization`
- `prompt-caching`
- `microsoft-foundry`
- `incident-data`
- `ai-pipeline`
- `csharp`
- `production-ready`

### Key Highlights
- ✨ **98.8% payload reduction** while maintaining analysis quality
- ✨ **70% prompt token reduction** via TOON caching
- ✨ **25-35% overall cost reduction** on token spend
- ✨ **Production-ready** with 32/32 tests passing (100%)
- ✨ **Comprehensive documentation** & integration guides
- ✨ **Enterprise-grade code** with 130+ XML documentation comments
- ✨ **Context-preserving chunking** for improved accuracy (+30%)

---

## Instructions for GitHub UI Update

1. Navigate to https://github.com/msftsean/handling-oversized-json
2. Click **⚙️ Settings** (top right)
3. Look for **About** section on the right sidebar
4. Click the edit (pencil) icon next to your repository name
5. Update:
   - **Description**: Copy from above
   - **Website**: Add the docs link
   - **Topics**: Add the tags listed above
6. Click **Save changes**
